interactivity.requirements: You must be on at least Day  98  to unlock this Event. 5 Ami Lust
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Upon fulfilling all Requirements, this Event automatically occurs on the first day on or after Day 98.
interactivity.to_miss_this_event: Choose "..." in No One Can See Us . Replaced by Falling, Falling, Falling .

progression.synopsis: Ami drags Sensei along with her to the manga club room under the guise of helping her clean. After hearing that he's the club advisor, a detail he immediately forgets, and hearing what she actually needs from him, he accepts only he can help and follows her in. Once inside, Ami reminds him of much she loves and the two spend some time alone before heading back home.
trivia: Since this is Ami's first Lust Event, you can change the nickname she calls you. The list of names that result in altered interactions can be found here .

changelog: This Event was added in Update .5.0.
